jd: Hello,Hope you are doing well!!My name is Deepali Jha and I am a Staffing Specialist at Sibitalent. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients. Job Title - Java Developers (Need Ex Walmart candidate)Visa :: No H1B/CPTLocation :: Hybrid in Reston, VA or Bentonville, ARDuration :: 6+ months Experience :: 8+ yearsNote:- Need local and strong candidateNeed Ex Walmart Description:-**Must be former Walmart**Tech/Skills/Must Haves: Java, Kafka, Node.JS, WCNP (Walmart Cloud Native Platform), DB Migration/services (stored procedures), scripts, and ability to write and run Test casesNotes: Looking for someone who is able to be a critical thinker and act very independently once assigned a task. This is a modernization project and this person needs to be able to think/act in this sequence of: coding -> review -> debugging -> coding (on one's own). Additionally, it is highly desired they ave WCNP and Perl scripting (for debugging) experience.
